error404Text: Ne aradığından emin değilim ama böyle bir sayfa yok. Belki şu sayfayı deneyebilirsin:
errorConnection: Could not connect to device, make sure that adb server is not running on your machine (adb kill-server) and that you are not connected in another tab/window.
warningConnection: Connect your rooted Goggles or Air Unit via USB, make sure they are powered on and hit the connect button.
